# minimumRelativeValue

**Instance Property**

The value that maps to the minimum viewer offset.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var minimumRelativeValue: Any? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The value in this property is the value returned when the viewer offset value along the given axis is -1.

## Accessing the motion attributes

- **keyPath**: The key path you want to modify on the view.
- **type**: The tilt direction to monitor.
- **maximumRelativeValue**: The value that maps to the maximum viewer offset.
